basics.name: Amr Yasser
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a passionate game developer with over seven years of experience specializing in programming and creating innovative solutions using the Unity engine. As a freelance developer, I have contributed to diverse projects, delivering tailored gameplay mechanics, efficient systems, and engaging user experiences. My goal is to continue advancing in the game development industry, pushing creative and technical boundaries. In addition to my technical expertise, I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Law at Ain Shams University, set to graduate in Spring 2025. My legal studies have honed my analytical and problem-solving skills, complementing my ability to approach development challenges with precision and creativity. I am driven by a passion for learning, collaboration, and bringing ideas to life through impactful games. Whether working independently or as part of a team, I strive to deliver high-quality results and contribute meaningfully to innovative projects.

work.highlights: Freelance development and production of games, applications, and websites. Proficient in various programming engines such as Unity 3D and Android Studio. Skilled in different programming languages including C#, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL.

Compiling, verifying accuracy, and sorting information to prepare source data for computer entry. Inserting customer and account data by inputting text-based and numerical information from source documents within time limits.
Converting to digital and printing documents, scientific papers, and legal documents. Research and obtain further information for incomplete documents. Scan documents and print files when needed.
